name: Mountain of Agents
tag_list: real-estate, realtors, realtor, real-estate-agent-directory, realtor-directory, ratings, consumer-ratings
overview:
Mountain of Agents is a small startup comprised of consumers passionate about connecting home buyers/sellers with great real estate agents through objectivity, transparency & positive ratings.

For real estate agents, joining Mountain of Agents gives them objective brand enhancement and credibility through organic SEO, social media, video greetings and positive ratings.

What makes this consumer directory unique is it’s rating system. You won’t find any anonymous written testimonials on Mountain of Agents. Instead, the site relies on objective, cumulative ratings based in six categories that matter most to consumers. And, the integration with Facebook ensures each rating is unique while providing the opportunity for real estate agents to take advantage of Facebook’s viral aspects.
